labels.stillLoggedIn: You're still logged in. Your session is safe.

notFound.subtitle: Page Not Found
notFound.messageDescription: The page you're looking for might have been moved, renamed, or doesn't exist. Check the URL or head back to the dashboard.

serverError.subtitle: Server Error
serverError.messageTitle: Something went wrong on our end
serverError.messageDescription: We're experiencing technical difficulties. Our team has been notified. Please try again in a few moments.

forbidden.subtitle: Access Denied
forbidden.messageTitle: You don't have permission to view this
forbidden.messageDescription: Your account doesn't have the required permissions to access this resource. Contact your administrator if you believe this is an error.

unauthorized.subtitle: Unauthorized
unauthorized.messageDescription: You need to sign in to access this page. Your session may have expired.

maintenance.subtitle: Under Maintenance
maintenance.messageDescription: We're performing scheduled maintenance to improve your experience. Please check back in a few minutes.
